socialSignup.title: Welcome to the noury app
socialSignup.subtitle: There are lots of delicious snacks, drinks and meals waiting for you

signup.title: Create your account
signup.subtitle: After your registration is complete, you can see our opportunity products.
signup.passwordLength: Password should be at least {{length}} characters long
signup.firstNameLength: First name should be at least {{length}} characters long
signup.lastNameLength: Last name should be at least {{length}} characters long

checkEmailOnboard.title: Check your email
checkEmailOnboard.subtitle: We have sent you a confirmation link to <1><0>{{email}} </0></1>, Please click on the link to activate your account.(also check the Spam folder).

signin.authTooMany: Too many attempts, please try again later
signin.passwordLength: Password must be at least {{length}} characters long
signin.title: Let's sign you in
signin.usernameLength: E-mail must be at least {{length}} characters long

user.title: New user profile
subtitles: Specify food preferences for personalized discounts

setting.title: Advanced functionalities
subtitles: Registration and login via Google Sign-In

personalInfo.firstSubtitle: Enjoy exclusive culinary offers and refreshing drinks at your noury
personalInfo.secondSubtitle: After successful registration you can benefit from our service.
personalInfo.lastNameNotCorrect: Please enter a correct last name.
personalInfo.firstNameNotCorrect: Please enter a correct first name.
personalInfo.phoneNumberPattern: Phone number may only contain digits and spaces
personalInfo.phoneNumberCountryCode: Phone number needs country code prefix
personalInfo.ageLessThan10: Please call your parents for permission.

eatingPreferences.firstSubtitle: Tell us what type of diet you have, so you get special discounts and actions on your preferences
eatingPreferences.secondSubtitle: Choose your preferred diet type and receive tailored discounts and promotions that suit your preferences!
eatingPreferences.thirdTitle: Do you have allergies or intolerances?
eatingPreferences.thirdSubtitle: Tell us about your allergies or intolerances to find out about products that meet your needs!

addPayment.title: Add payment method
addPayment.subtitle: Please add a payment method in order to open the fridge and get the best of our app

paymentAddedSuccess.title: Congratulations!
paymentAddedSuccess.subtitle: Your payment method has been successfully added.

forgotPass.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPass.subtitle: Enter your e-mail address and we will send you instructions on how to reset your password.

checkEmailForgetPass.title: Check your email
checkEmailForgetPass.subtitle: We've sent you instructions on how to reset the password (also check the Spam folder).

scan.title: Scan QR Code
scan.permissionMessage: We need your permission to use your camera

confirmDeleteCard.subtitle: Are you sure you want to delete the payment method? {{maskedCreditCard}}
confirmDeleteCard.title: Delete Payment Method

transactionHistory.title: Transaction History
transactionHistory.emptyTransaction:
It looks like you haven't 
used the noury yet.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.newsletterDescription: Stay up to date and get exclusive discounts with our Noury newsletter!
notifications.pushNotificationsDescription: Receive notifications directly on your mobile device!
notifications.emailReceiptDescription: Receive your receipt automatically by email and stay informed about your purchase!

notificationList.title: Notifications
notificationList.noNotifications: There are currently no notifications for you. As soon as there is something new, you will be informed here first.

feedback.title: FeedBack
feedback.subtitle: Feel free to contact us with any enquiry, we will do our best to clarify any issue as promptly as possible.
feedback.subject: Subject
feedback.successMessage:
Your feedback has been received and we will contact you soon. 
Thank you!
feedback.failMessage: Oops, we hit a snag! Tap "Try again" or reach out to us by phone. Your message matters to us!

openedFridge.title: Success!
openedFridge.subtitle: The noury is open
openedFridge.description: You can now take out your products.
openedFridge.warningSubtitle: The fridge will close after 2 minutes. Please pick up your items before the session expires

scanCodeSuccess.title: QR Code Successfully Scanned
scanCodeSuccess.subtitle: Done! Get ready to discover culinary treasures.

closeFridge.title: Thank you!
closeFridge.subtitle: We are glad that you took these products from the noury.

failedPayment.title: Payment Failed!
failedPayment.subtitle: Your payment at <1><0>{{date}}</0></1> o'clock was unsuccessful.
failedPayment.description: Please settle the outstanding amount with an alternative payment method to reopen the noury.

confirmPreferredCard.title: Set Payment Method
confirmPreferredCard.subtitle: Are you sure you want to set this payment method as your default one?

SuccessfulPayment.title: Thank You Very Much!
SuccessfulPayment.subtitle: Your payment was successful. You can reopen the noury.

failedTransactionModal.title: Transaction Failed!
failedTransactionModal.transactionDate: Your last transaction on <1><0>{{date}}</0></1> was not successful.
failedTransactionModal.subtitle: Please pay the outstanding amount to reopen the noury.

deleteAccountModal.title: Delete account
deleteAccountModal.subtitle: Are you sure you want to delete your account?

happyPointsModal.title: Easy to pay with HappyPoints
happyPointsModal.firstParagraph: <1>Use HappyPoints: </1>Your points have priority and will be used first.
happyPointsModal.secondParagraph: <1>With low HappyPoints: </1>If your points are low, we will use all available points first and automatically balance the rest with your saved payment method.
happyPointsModal.thirdParagraph: <1>With no remaining HappyPoints: </1>If your HappyPoints are depleted, the transaction will automatically start with your saved payment method.

notificationPermissions.title: Notification Permissions
notificationPermissions.message: Your permission is required to use notifications
notificationPermissions.approvalFailed: Please allow for notifications in your settings.

noCabinets.description:
It looks like you haven't scanned a Noury yet.
 Let us begin!
noCabinets.firstPoint: Go to the Noury in your company.
noCabinets.secondPoint: Scan the QR code with this app and make your first transaction.
noCabinets.fourthPoint: Then return to Noury Live to see what's available in your Noury.
noCabinets.instructions:
Tap below to open Noury
 and discover the whole world of Noury Live.

nouryLive.description: Select your Noury to discover the latest products and offers.

addNewPayment.title: Add new payment
addNewPayment.text: Please add a payment method so you can open the noury and use the app optimally.

howItWorks.title: Hello everyOne
howItWorks.text: Watch our short tutorial to see how you can open your noury.

firstTransaction.title: Your first transaction
firstTransaction.text: Great, you have added a payment method! Let's start opening the noury.
firstTransaction.firstPoint: Tap the lock icon at the bottom in the middle.
firstTransaction.thirdPoint: Open your noury and take your favorite product.

HappyPointsComponents.title: Add HappyPoints
HappyPointsComponents.text:
Do you have a HappyPoint code?  
 Redeem it now!

askingForEatingPreferences.title: Specify Eating Preferences
askingForEatingPreferences.subtitle: Share your eating habits with us so we can offer you targeted promotions, offers, and discounts tailored to your needs.

addHappyPointsModal.title: Add HappyPoints
addHappyPointsModal.description: Enter your code for HappyPoints. Please note that the code is only valid once.
addHappyPointsModal.INVALID_CODE_FORMAT: Invalid format. Please check your entry.
addHappyPointsModal.VOUCHER_EXPIRED: Voucher expired. Use a valid one.

happyPointsAdded.title: Congratulations!
happyPointsAdded.subtitle: Your HappyPoints have been successfully added.

openFridgeWithDeepLink.title: Would you like to open the fridge?

cameraPermission.title: Permission Required
cameraPermission.description: Camera permission is required to scan QR codes.

onboardingNotification.title: Don’t miss anything
onboardingNotification.description: Receive regular push notifications so you don’t miss any of our offers and discounts.

customerSupport.title: Support
customerSupport.info: For urgent matters, you can call us at any time. Standard call rates apply.

refund.title: Refund Request
refund.description: Is there something wrong with a transaction? You can submit a refund request here.
refund.successMessage: Your refund request has been successfully submitted. We will review your request and contact you shortly with further updates.
refund.failMessage: Oops, we hit a snag! Tap "Try again" or reach out to us by phone. Your message matters to us!

technicalIssues.title: Technical Issue
technicalIssues.subtitle: Don’t hesitate to contact us if your Noury, a payment method, or any other feature is not working as expected.
technicalIssues.subject: Subject
technicalIssues.successMessage:
Your technical issue has been received and we will contact you soon. 
Thank you!
technicalIssues.failMessage: Oops, we hit a snag! Tap "Try again" or reach out to us by phone. Your message matters to us!

requestNewProduct.title: New Product Request
requestNewProduct.subtitle: Do you have an idea for a new food or drink product you’d love to have in your fridge? We’re always excited to hear your suggestions!
requestNewProduct.description: Let us know which product you think should be added to Noury.
requestNewProduct.subject: Your Product Request

errorFallback.title: Oops! Somthing went wrong.
errorFallback.description:
We are sorry for the inconvenience. 
Please refresh the app.

takePhotoPermission.title: Permission Required
takePhotoPermission.description: Camera permission is required to take a photo.
